Shin Nippon Pro Wrestling Toukon Retsuden 4 (JP)-38060_top.jpg

software.name: Shinkisekai Evolution
software.Description:
Let the Evolution Begin!
Join Mag Launcher in his battle against the 8th Empire!
The first RPG for the Sega Dreamcast! - Revolutionary 3D graphics only possible on the Sega Dreamcast! - Battle animated bosses using the advanced 360/3D combat system - Lightning-quick action at 60 FPS - Explore randomized dungeons for a unique experience on every venture - Discover precious artifacts and treasures to earn magical powers and advanced special moves - 360 Camera angles protect against unforeseen enemies
"A SHINING EXAMPLE OF SEGA DREAMCAST POWER" - SegaDreamcast.net
software.AKA: Shinkisekai Evolution (JP), Evolution: The World of Sacred Device (US, EU)

Release.name: Evolution: The World of Sacred Device

ReleaseImages.Image: Evolution The World of Sacred Device (US)-3393_front.jpg
Evolution The World of Sacred Device (US)-3393_back.jpg
Evolution The World of Sacred Device (US)-3393_side.jpg

Release.name: Evolution: The World of Sacred Device

ReleaseImages.Image: Evolution The World of Sacred Device (EU)-3394_front.jpg
Evolution The World of Sacred Device (EU)-3394_back.jpg
Evolution The World of Sacred Device (EU)-3394_side.jpg

software.name: Shinkisekai Evolution 2
software.Description: The power to destroy seeks the power to heal. Mag Launcher must choose between his dream of being the world's greatest adventurer or saving his best friend, Linear. At the center of the conflict lies Yurka, a mysterious new force. To survive, they all must learn the difference between what they see and what they believe.
software.AKA: Evolution 2: Far Off Promise (EU, US), Shinkisekai Evolution 2 (JP)

software.name: Shinri Game, The
software.Description: The Shinri Game is an Adventure game, developed and published by Visit, which was released in Japan in 2001.

software.name: Shinseiki Evangelion: Ayanami Ikusei Keikaku
software.Description: Shinseiki Evangelion: Ayanami Ikusei Keikaku is a Strategy game, developed by West One and published by Broccoli, which was released in Japan in 2002.

software.name: Shinseiki Evangelion: Typing E-Keikaku
software.Description: Shinseiki Evangelion: Typing E-Keikaku is a Miscellaneous game, published by Gainax, which was released in Japan in 2001.

software.name: Shinseiki Evangelion: Typing Hokan Keikaku
software.Description: Shinseiki Evangelion: Typing Hokan Keikaku is an Action game, published by Gainax, which was released in Japan in 2001.

software.name: Shirotsume Kusa Hanashi: Episode of the Clovers
software.Description: Shirotsume Kusa Hanashi: Episode of the Clovers is an Adventure game, developed by LittleWitch and published by NEC Interchannel, which was released in Japan in 2003.

Release.name: Shirotsume Kusa Hanashi: Episode of the Clovers

ReleaseImages.Image: Shirotsume Kusa Hanashi Episode of the Clovers (JP)-318776_front.jpg

Release.name: Shirotsume Kusa Hanashi: Episode of the Clovers (First Print Limited Edition)

ReleaseImages.Image: Shirotsume Kusa Hanashi Episode of the Clovers (First Print Limited Edition) (JP)-318777_front.jpg
Shirotsume Kusa Hanashi Episode of the Clovers (First Print Limited Edition) (JP)-318777_back.jpg

software.name: Shrapnel: Urban Warfare 2025
software.Description: Shrapnel: Urban Warfare 2025 is an Action game, developed by Zombie Studios and published by Ripcord Games, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Shutoko Battle
software.Description: Throw down against road rivals in Point Battle Mode, customize your import dream ride in Quest Mode, or choose Versus Mode to go head-to-head at a blistering 60 frames-per-second in Tokyo Highway Challenge.

software.name: Shutoko Battle 2
software.Description: Screaming around a blind turn, you cut your opponent off, driving him head-on into the divider. Toast. This is the world of Tokyo Xtreme Racer 2, a blistering battle to rule the streets of Tokyo. With an endless supply of bloodthirsty rivals, it's a high-adrenaline fight to become Emperor of the Streets. Customize your car with hundreds of parts and features. Cruise over 100 miles of highly-detailed of Tokyo highway. Personalize your team logo and share or trade it. Hundreds of new opponents and teams push your skills to the max.

software.name: Sierra Sports: Game Room
software.Description: Sierra Sports: Game Room is a Sports game, developed by Sierra Entertainment and published by Berkeley, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Silent Scope
software.Description: Get ready to experience the arcade hit on your Dreamcast. The President and his family have been kidnapped by lethal terrorists, and the government turns to an elite counter-terrorist sniper to neutralize the hostile threats. Your mission is to infiltrate the terrorist's headquarters, clear all areas of danger and return the President's family safely to the White House.

software.name: Silver
software.Description:
Silver, a corrupt and sinister sorcerer, rules the land of Jarrah with an iron fist. He and his henchmen have abducted the village women as part of a pact with the almighty god, Apocalypse.
Now, only one man can put a stop to Silver and his minions - it's you, David, a promising young knight determined to save his beloved.
The right side of vengeance is coming...
- Wield your sword! Slash through your opponents in real-time combat - Interact with scores of different characters - Recruit allies - each with unique abilities - Travel through hundreds of beautiful but dangerous locations - Marvel at vivid special effects, powerful magical spells and mighty weaponry that you will acquire on your journey

software.name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 1: The Renai Adventure: Bitter Sweet Fools
software.Description: The Renai Adventure: Bitter Sweet Fools is an Adventure game, developed by HuneX and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2002.
software.AKA: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 1: The Renai Adventure: Bitter Sweet Fools (JP)

Release.name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 1: The Renai Adventure: Bitter Sweet Fools

ReleaseImages.Image: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 1 The Renai Adventure Bitter Sweet Fools (JP)-20602_front.jpg
Simple 2000 Series Vol. 1 The Renai Adventure Bitter Sweet Fools (JP)-20602_back.jpg

software.name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 2: The Renai Simulation: Natsuiro Celebration
software.Description: You're a high school student enyoing summer with your best friend Kimi. One day of August, she receives a call from her father, telling her to go home in 21 days. You then start enjoying those last days together...
software.AKA: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 2: The Renai Simulation: Natsuiro Celebration (JP)

Release.name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 2: The Renai Simulation: Natsuiro Celebration

software.Description: The Renai Simulation 2: Fureai is an Adventure game, developed by HuneX and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2002.

software.Description: The Renai Adventure: Okaeri!! is an Adventure game, developed by HuneX and published by D3Publisher, which was released in Japan in 2002.
software.AKA: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 4: The Renai Adventure: Okaeri!! (JP)

ReleaseImages.Image: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 4 The Renai Adventure Okaeri!! (JP)-20397_front.jpg
Simple 2000 Series Vol. 4 The Renai Adventure Okaeri!! (JP)-20397_back.jpg

software.name: Sister Princess
software.Description: Sister Princess is an Adventure game, developed by Stack and published by Media Works, which was released in Japan in 2002.

software.name: Sister Princess Premium Edition
software.Description: Sister Princess is an Adventure game, developed by Stack and published by Media Works, which was released in Japan in 2002.

software.name: Skies of Arcadia
software.Description: The age of exploration has dawned and you are about to embark on a magical journey, a voyage of discovery across the vast Skies of Arcadia in search of treasures untold, and where there is treasure, there will be Air Pirates! With over six vast lands to navigate, magnificent ships to fly and customize, a host of weapons and magical spells to be discovered and unique Internet functions to aid your quest, Skies of Arcadia is the most immense gaming experience ever created.

software.name: SLaVE
software.Description: SLaVE is an Action game, developed by Isotope Softworks and published by GOAT Store Publishing, with no announced release date.

software.name: Slave Zero
software.Description: It's 500 years in the future. Man and machine are virtually one and the greatest megacity in the world is locked in a brutal war. You are the ultimate saboteur and part of an elite fighting force. Your mission: Steal the largest, most sophisticated biomechanical attack weapon ever designed... and kick some serious ass!

software.name: Sno-Cross Championship Racing
software.Description: Strap on your goggle and helmet, choose your favorite sled and hit the courses. Gain experience day and night, sun, rain or snow, racing on the icy flats of Murmansk, the slopes of Aspen and the tunnels of Nagano.

software.name: SnoCross Championship Racing
software.Description: Strap on your goggle and helmet, choose your favorite sled and hit the courses. Gain experience day and night, sun, rain or snow, racing on the icy flats of Murmansk, the slopes of Aspen and the tunnels of Nagano.

software.name: Snow
software.Description: Snow is an Adventure game, published by NEC Interchannel, which was released in Japan in 2003.

software.name: Snow Surfers
software.Description: Slash and burn your way through wild and wintery terrain - jump huge boulders, shred steep ravines, and rack up the points with your insane tricks. -3 Game Modes available: Free Ride, Super Pipe, & Match Race for two players -Full collection of tricks & moves -Seven main characters with unique styles and varying degrees of snowboarding skills -Silky smooth graphics at 60 frames per second

software.name: Soccer Tsuku Tokudai Gou 2: J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou!
software.Description: Soccer Tsuku Tokudai Gou 2: J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! is a Sports game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 2001.

Release.name: Soccer Tsuku Tokudai Gou 2: J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou!

ReleaseImages.Image: Soccer Tsuku Tokudai Gou 2 J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! (JP)-304108_front.jpg
Soccer Tsuku Tokudai Gou 2 J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! (JP)-304108_back.jpg

software.name: Soccer Tsuku Tokudai Gou J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou!
software.Description: Soccer Tsuku Tokudai Gou J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! is a Sports game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 2000.

Release.name: Soccer Tsuku Tokudai Gou J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou!

ReleaseImages.Image: Soccer Tsuku Tokudai Gou J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! (JP)-316662_front.jpg
Soccer Tsuku Tokudai Gou J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! (JP)-316662_back.jpg

software.name: Soldier of Fortune
software.Description:
You are John Mullins. You're the world's deadliest soldier of fortune and your mission is clear: survive. Track down and take out a fanatical terrorist organization bent on the mass murder and destruction in intense and explosive missions. With an arsenal of powerful and deadly real-world weapons at your disposal, engage in sabotage, stealthy assassination, and full frontal assaults where only skill marks the difference between the hunter and the hunted.
- Ultra-realistic action!. Up to 26 different hit locations on each enemy for pinpoint accuracy and realism! - Includes deadly international missions: "operate" on a speeding African freight train, Iraqi oil refinery, Russian chemical plant, and other political hotspots spanning 5 continents. - Rip your way past enemy lines utilizing the world's most lethal weaponry, including sniper rifles, white phosphorous grenades, and prototype microwave pulse guns. - Living 3-D environments. Infiltrate foreign locations as civilians and terrorists go about their lives as if your weren't there, until you blow your cover. - Optimized Quake II engine for unprecedented enemy detail and realistic weapons damage.

software.name: Sonic Adventure
software.Description: Sonic is back to save the world in his biggest adventure yet. The mad scientist Dr. Robotnik has found a way to harness pure evil from the chaos emeralds and destroy the world. Joined by friends new and old, Sonic must keep Dr Robotnik from obtaining all seven emeralds and unleashing Chaos on the world. Sonic makes his debut to the Dreamcast in a full 3D world of visual splendour, providing a thrilling experience. Featuring signature high velocity action stages and adventure fields, Sonic's adventures are only just beginning!

software.name: Sonic Adventure 2
software.Description: The world can be a confusing and dangerous place, especially when there are two of you! Sonic must face the new, villainous Shadow but you choose how the story unfolds - you can be a hero, or make friends with the dark-side! In the most thrilling Sonic Adventure ever created there are 6 playable characters, new moves to master, over 30 challenging stages and 3 different 2 player games - will you save the world or conquer it?

software.name: Sonic Adventure 2 The Trial
software.Description: Sonic Adventure 2 The Trial is an Action game, developed by Sonic Team and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Sonic Adventure International
software.Description: Sonic is back to save the world in his biggest adventure yet. The mad scientist Dr. Robotnik has found a way to harness pure evil from the chaos emeralds and destroy the world. Joined by friends new and old, Sonic must keep Dr Robotnik from obtaining all seven emeralds and unleashing Chaos on the world. Sonic makes his debut to the Dreamcast in a full 3D world of visual splendour, providing a thrilling experience. Featuring signature high velocity action stages and adventure fields, Sonic's adventures are only just beginning!

software.name: Sonic Shuffle
software.Description: Illumina, the Guardian Angel, needs your help. The mysterious monster Void has locked up the power of the Precioustones, and it's up to you to guide Sonic and his friends through incredible game boards to recover them. Play with up to 3 friends to find out who will be the first to save the land of Maginaryworld. Play minigames, fight bosses, work your way through special events, and more, in Sonic's latest adventure!

software.name: Sorcerian: Shichisei Mahou no Shito
software.Description: Sorcerian: Shichisei Mahou no Shito is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Victor Interactive Software, which was released in Japan in 2000.

Release.name: Sorcerian: Shichisei Mahou no Shito (Limited Edition)

ReleaseImages.Image: Sorcerian Shichisei Mahou no Shito (Limited Edition) (JP)-7359_front.jpg
Sorcerian Shichisei Mahou no Shito (Limited Edition) (JP)-7359_back.jpg

software.name: Soul Fighter
software.Description: An evil curse has fallen on the kingdom of Gomar. As a mysterious mist envelopes the kingdom the inhabitants turn into vicious creatures. A fearless warrior, female spy and powerful wizard have escaped the fate of their fellow villagers. They must now search for and capture souls in order to reverse the curse.

software.name: Soul Reaver 2
software.Description: In this sequel to the Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver, reassume the role of Raziel, and travel back through the currents of time into various eras of Nosgoth's past in your relentless pursuit of Kain. With new Soul Rever weapon enhancements, physical abilities, and relics, you'll battle vampire hunters, Sarafan warrior-priests, and spectral spirits, and then devour their souls. Unearth the mysteries of Nosgoth's ancient races, and expose the schemes behind the corruption of the Pillars and the vampire genocide.

software.name: SoulCalibur
software.Description: This is a tale of souls and swords, transcending the world and all its history, told for all eternity... The greatest weapons-based fighter returns, this time on Sega Dreamcast. Soul Calibur unleashes incredible graphics, fantastic fighters, and combos so amazing they'll make your head spin!

software.name: South Park Rally
software.Description:
Get drivin' with your bad self!
Face off against Cartman, Grandpa, Scuzzlebutt, Starvin' Marvin and the rest of South Park in the wildest, raunchiest road race ever. Loaded with dozens of insane vehicles and sweet custom sound-bites!

software.name: South Park: Chef's Luv Shack
software.Description: All your favorite South park characters are waiting for you at Chef's Luv Shack. Spreading the hot buttered game lovin' with dozens of crazy mini-games. Testing your South park knowledge with outrageous trivia questions. And telling it like it is with insane sound-bites! Spread the luv!

software.name: Space Channel 5
software.Description: Get into the groove with Ulala, space goddess extraordinaire and TV diva, out-dance those evil but funky invading aliens, rescue their wacky dancing hostages, and get her TV ratings to soar! "Space Channel 5" merges adventure and music action with a hip leading lady who will groove the hearts of gamers of all ages. "Space Channel 5" has mesmerizing gameplay, with characters and visuals so unique, why resist? The rhythm's gonna get ya!

software.name: Space Channel 5 Part 2
software.Description: Space Channel 5 Part 2 follows famed reporter and dancer Ulala as she battles the Rhythm Rogues-a group of villains led by the mysterious Purge and his right-hand man Shadow-in a quest to rescue thousands of people who have been kidnapped and forced to dance. Players will need to help Ulala move and "chu chu chu" her way to victory over these evil-doers before they succeed in taking over the universe with their ultimate dance-control weapon.

software.name: Spawn: In the Demon's Hand
software.Description: The legendary hellbound comic anti-hero comes to life. Straight from the blockbuster arcade game, this home version kicks it up a notch with ever more features and modes of play. Up to 4 players can battle in the "death match-style" Battle Royal Mode or choose a computer controlled teammate to take on Team Battle Mode. All your favorite characters from the Spawn series are faithfully recreated in the ultimate death match challenge.

software.name: Spec Ops II: Omega Squad
software.Description: Players step into the boots of America's elite Special Forces to take on realistic military missions in an intense 1st-person shooter. Learn first-hand what it means to be called America's Best. with a known following Spec Ops: Omega Squad brings a proven genre to Sega Dreamcast with all guns blazing.

software.name: Speed Devils
software.Description: Wicked-fast hot-rod racing. High stakes gambling & custom car racing through Satan's playground! 12 Brutal Tracks. 11 screaming-fast hot-rods.

software.name: Speed Devils Online Racing
software.Description:
Attention sinners. The most infernal arcade racer ever is now online. All the hellish tracks, tricked out cars, and shady side bets from the original Speed Devils return.
Blistering New Features: New Cars - 22 (11 new) machines, All original courses online plus new bonus course, Single player offline, up to 5-Player online, 22 new ways to gamble your cars and cash.
Intense Online Mayhem. Customize your online persona with quotes and characters. Win your opponents' cars online. Make and take your own insane bets with players nationwide.

software.name: Spider-Man
software.Description: He spins a web, swings across the sky and lands with a somersault onto the Daily Bugle building. Who is this masked hero? It's you! Fight, jump and web-sling as Spider-Man as you take on a legion of sinister villains. The city is depending on you. Start swinging...

software.name: Spirit of Speed 1937
software.Description: Experience the sensation of total speed in the most exciting classic race cars of the 1930's, a thrill that swept the world and saw the rise of some of today's most prestigious car manufacturers such as Alfa Romeo and Mercedes.

software.name: Sports Jam
software.Description: Foot ball, Baseball, Basketball, Hockey, Tennis, Soccer, Golf, and Cycling! You must master skills from each of these sports to take on competitors in your quest to earn the title of King of Sports! Each game features full 3D characters and background graphics detailing your accomplishments or defeats. Play well and you'll learn what it feels like to be a champion in the greatest sports the world has to offer!

software.name: Star Gladiator 2: Nightmare of Blisten
software.Description:
In a war torn future...
Hundreds of years into the future and scientific advancement has put Earth on the brink of mental warfare. The manical terrorist, Dr. Bilsten, once thought dead, has been sighted on the planet Zeta, where he reportedly died in battle. Enter Plasma Sword, sequel to Capcom's critically acclaimed Star Gladiator. This surreal 3-D fighter features 22 stunningly rendered fighters with awe-inspiring moves, breathtaking combos and lightning fast gameplay. Now, a new legion of agile warriors forms to battle the next generation and unlock the new mysteries of Plasma Power.

software.name: Star Trek: New Worlds
software.Description: Star Trek: New Worlds is a Strategy game, developed by Runecraft and published by Interplay, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Star Wars Episode I: Jedi Power Battles
software.Description: Take back the Theed palace in fast and furious lightsaber assaults. You will have the power of the Force and your trusty Jedi saber as you ward off legions of battle droids, destroyer droids, assassins and other creatures from the Star Wars: Episode I worlds.

Release.name: Star Wars Episode I: Jedi Power Battles

ReleaseImages.Image: Star Wars Episode I Jedi Power Battles (US)-9370_front.jpg
Star Wars Episode I Jedi Power Battles (US)-9370_back.jpg
Star Wars Episode I Jedi Power Battles (US)-9370_side.jpg

software.name: Star Wars Episode I: Racer
software.Description: Relive all the thrills and excitement of the Podracer sequence from Star Wars: Episode I. Hang on tight - with afterburners on, Podracers max out at a simulated 600 mph! Race in furious competition against 21+ opponents. Take on over 21 tracks on 8 unique worlds. Avoid hazards such as methane leaks, meteor showers and Tusken Raiders! Spectacular 3D environments. Vehicle sound effects and soundtrack taken directly from Episode I.

software.name: Star Wars: Demolition
software.Description:
THE MIGHTY JABBA ASKS THAT YOU DIE HONORABLY
Total vehicular mayhem: special attacks and 4 game modes including tournament and high stakes.
Blast your way to victory with an arsenal that includes laser cannons, proton torpedos and concussion missiles.
Winner takes all in 8 intense arenas with over 10 Star Wars vehicles to choose from.

software.name: Star Wars: Super Bombad Racing
software.Description: Take the high-speed turns, crazy jumps and wild gadgets of bigheaded cart racing, jumble it with the gravity-defying hyperspaced pace of Star Wars, and you've got a racing game with an entirely new edge! As one of eight highly stylized Star Wars personalities, you'll zip through a galaxy of locations zapping your friends and beating your opponents in an all out free-for-all filled with crazy powerups, big air jumps, and even a few surprises!

software.name: StarLancer
software.Description: From Erin and Chris Roberts, the award winning designers of Wing Commander comes a game beyond the reaches of your imagination. Battle for control of the galaxy as a member of the elite 45th Squadron or take on your friends in epic, multi-player deathmatch battles. With every hour, the Coalition grows stronger, and the fall of the Alliance is at hand. Fight for Freedom! The 45th Wants You!

software.name: Street Fighter Alpha 3
software.Description: Street Fighter Alpha 3 explodes onto the Sega Dreamcast with new features and astonishing arcade perfection. Choose from over 30 characters, each with 3 different fighting styles. Street Fighter Alpha 3 is loaded with new enhancements and modes of play -- like the around-the-world, skill building World Tour Mode and amazing 3 player Dramatic Battle. If it's a fight you're looking for, this is your game!
software.AKA: Street Fighter Zero 3: Saikyooryuu Doujou (JP), Street Fighter Zero 3: Saikyooryuu Doujou for Matching Service (JP)

Release.name: Street Fighter Zero 3: Saikyooryuu Doujou for Matching Service

ReleaseImages.Image: Street Fighter Zero 3 Saikyooryuu Doujou for Matching Service (JP)-7683_front.jpg
Street Fighter Zero 3 Saikyooryuu Doujou for Matching Service (JP)-7683_back.jpg

software.name: Street Fighter III: 3rd Strike
software.Description: This amazing fighter stars 18 brawlers from the STREET FIGHTER III universe and introduces the new Leap Attack. Plus, a new Grade Judge system evaluates player performance at the end of each match. Huge characters and an innovative Hit-Frame system team up with the return of the Super Arts Fighting Styles. Experience totally seamless animation in the newest chapter of the greatest arcade series ever!

software.name: Street Fighter III: Double Impact
software.Description: Street Fighter® fans everywhere get a double-dose of double-trouble with Street Fighter III: Double Impact. This explosive street brawl for the Sega Dreamcast™ contains TWO arcade hits on one CD -- Street Fighter III: New Generation... and Street Fighter III: Second Impact. Loaded with a new legion of fighters, Street fighter III: Double Impact boasts new enhancements to the series like parrying, Super Art fighting styles and two-punch, two-kick fighting styles to inflict more damage.

software.name: Street Fighter III: W Impact
software.Description: Street Fighter® fans everywhere get a double-dose of double-trouble with Street Fighter III: Double Impact. This explosive street brawl for the Sega Dreamcast™ contains TWO arcade hits on one CD -- Street Fighter III: New Generation... and Street Fighter III: Second Impact. Loaded with a new legion of fighters, Street fighter III: Double Impact boasts new enhancements to the series like parrying, Super Art fighting styles and two-punch, two-kick fighting styles to inflict more damage.

software.name: Striker Pro 2000
software.Description: Soccer as you've never seen it before! Lethally effective control system for fluid gameplay and spectacular goals. Stunning stadium and player detail - taking the game to a new level of realism. Advanced 3D engine and Artificial Intelligence combine to give an incredibly authentic playing environment. Pass a series of tests to improve your skills, earning the right to compete against the very best teams and players.

software.name: Stunt GP
software.Description:
Hold on tight for the ultimate in radio-controlled racing! Stunt GP is as close as you will ever get to the gravity-defying stunts and lightning-speed racing of radio-controlled cards. In a range of beautifully rich environments, jam-packed with ramps, fly-overs, and the loop-the-loops, perform exhilarating daredevil stunts while racing sensational vehicles at breakneck speeds. Stunt GP's stunning visuals provide total player immersion for maximum fun and adrenaline-pumping action.
- Race the 20 sensational vehicles from Wild Wheels, Aero Blasters, Speed Demons or Team Specials categories across 24 awesome, crazy tracks.
- Play in Arcade, Exhibition, Championship, Time trial and Stunt Challenge modes to earn a place on the leader board
- Customise your vehicles with thousands of possible different combinations to glean that last bit of speed or power or amazing stunts
- Beat Your Friends: Multiplayer Racing Action, split-screen head to head action.

software.name: Stupid Invaders
software.Description: Five goofy aliens, one earthbound tiny spaceship and a whole heap of trouble! Guide Etno and his alien pals (Bud, Gorgious, Stereo and Candy), through hilarious scenarios and escape the clutches, and scalpels, of Dr. Sakarine and Blok in this impressive, adult orientated, graphic adventure!

software.name: Sturmwind
software.Description:
You found the way in now find the way out!
Survive 16 levels and even more big grumpy boss enemies!
-16 levels -Huge boss enemies -FMV intro sequence -3 selectable weapons -3 selectable difficulty levels -Hundreds of different enemies

software.name: Suigetsu Mayoi-Gokoro
software.Description: On a summer afternoon, I woke up in a hospital bed without any recollection of the past. I was suffering from severe amnesia, and the ones who saved me as I trembled with doubt and fear through the night were my friends and my maid, Yuki. Through their kindness, my life began once again. However, the nightmare that haunted me ever since I woke up that day continued to torment me. In my dreams was a woman with pure white skin and black hair so lustrous it seemed to fade into the dark night. And within a few weeks, on the night of the Star Festival, I would meet this beautiful girl: Makino Nanami... The girl whom I killed with my arrow each and every night.

software.name: Suika
software.Description: Suika is an Adventure game, developed by Circus and published by Princess Soft, which was released in Japan in 2002.

software.name: Sunrise Eiyuutan
software.Description: Sunrise Eiyuutan is a Strategy game, developed by Atelier-Sai and published by Sunrise Interactive, which was released in Japan in 1999.

software.name: Super Euro Soccer 2000
software.Description: Super Euro Soccer 2000 is a Sports game, developed by Rage Software and published by Imagineer, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Super Magnetic Neo
software.Description:
Pinki and her goons have taken over Pao Pao Park and it's up to Neo set things right!
-Use Neo's magnetic powers to capture metallic enemies, catapult off platforms and rocket through the air! -Jump, run and swing your way across multiple levels and fantastic colorful worlds. -Uncover the secrets of Pao Pao Park by throwing switches, knocking over walls and riding the Super Camel Cycle.
"Every facet of the game, from its zany appearance to its goofy character design and nutty score, is tailored to perfection. Rating: A-" Gamers' Republic

software.name: Super Magnetic NiuNiu
software.Description:
Pinki and her goons have taken over Pao Pao Park and it's up to Neo set things right!

"Every facet of the game, from its zany appearance to its goofy character design and nutty score, is tailored to perfection. Rating: A-" Gamers' Republic

software.name: Super Runabout
software.Description:
White-knuckle it through the streets of San Francisco in Super Runabout, the ultimate go-anywhere driving game. Drive anywhere you want through parks, buildings, garages and more ... just don't let silly things like traffic laws get in the way of a little fun.
Take Control of Over 25 Unique Vehicles. Speed or Destruction, the Choice is Yours.
The More You Destroy the More Bank You Earn.
Challenge 16 Crazy Missions Within 2 Scenarios. Pick-Up Bombs, Take Out Kidnappers, Stop a Runaway Cable Car and More.
software.AKA: Super Runabout: The Golden State (EU), Super Runabout (JP)

software.name: Super Runabout: San Francisco Edition
software.Description:
White-knuckle it through the streets of San Francisco in Super Runabout, the ultimate go-anywhere driving game. Drive anywhere you want through parks, buildings, garages and more ... just don't let silly things like traffic laws get in the way of a little fun.
Take Control of Over 25 Unique Vehicles. Speed or Destruction, the Choice is Yours.
The More You Destroy the More Bank You Earn.
Challenge 16 Crazy Missions Within 2 Scenarios. Pick-Up Bombs, Take Out Kidnappers, Stop a Runaway Cable Car and More.
software.AKA: Super Runabout: The Golden State (EU), Super Runabout (JP)

White-knuckle it through the streets of San Francisco in Super Runabout, the ultimate go-anywhere driving game. Drive anywhere you want through parks, buildings, garages and more ... just don't let silly things like traffic laws get in the way of a little fun.
Take Control of Over 25 Unique Vehicles. Speed or Destruction, the Choice is Yours.

software.name: Super Speed Racing
software.Description: Start your engines! The CART Championship is up for grabs in the fastest open wheel racing circuit in the world. *19 true-to-life CART circuits including road, oval and street courses *27 authentic CART drivers from 18 actual teams *Fully customizable cars *Detailed put crew action

software.name: Super Street Fighter II X for Matching Service
software.Description: Super Street Fighter II X for Matching Service is an Action game, developed and published by Capcom, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Surf Rocket Racers
software.Description:
The growl of the engines drown out the shriek of the gulls and create an auditory exclamation point above the collected Surf Jockeys. Their marine muscle machines bob and jostle in the small wakes surrounding the starting gate.
The horn starts the competition, and in a flurry of jet wash and diesel fumes, the racers will make a mad dash for victory.
- The first wave racing title for the Sega Dreamcast - Shred the wake on 15 amazing courses. - Race against 5 rough riding surf jockeys in 3 difficulty modes. - Get big points as you roll and flip off multiple obstacles and jumps. - Multiple modes: Championship, Tricks & Techniques, Hazards & Obstacles, Head - Head

software.name: Suzuki Alstare Extreme Racing
software.Description: Join Team Suzuki Alstare for the fastest race of your life! Race wicked-fast bikes in the great outdoors. Customize the official Team bikes Suzuki Alstare SuperBike GSX-R750 and Suzuki Alstare SportBike GSX-R600. Fast-paced motorcycle racing at 60 Frames Per Second. Cutting Edge 3D graphics. Race on 12 Diverse tracks and then try them in Reverse Mode. 4 game modes including 2 player split-screen.

software.name: SWAT 3D
software.Description: SWAT 3D is an Action game, published by Berkeley, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Sweet Season
software.Description: Sweet Season is an Adventure game, developed and published by Takuyo, which was released in Japan in 2003.

software.name: Sword of the Berserk: Guts' Rage
software.Description: An outcast warrior enters a land plagued by an evil curse. Guts is unlike ordinary men for he carries the Dragon Slayer, a mighty blade of retribution whose fury knows no equal. His enemies will know true fear once they encounter his Berserk rage!
software.AKA: Berserk: Millennium Falcon Hen Wasurebana no Shou (JP)

software.name: Sydney 2000
software.Description: Experience the Sydney 2000 Olympic Games. Train your mind and body for competition in the Virtual Gym. 4 modes of play: Olympic, Arcade, Head-to-Head, or Coaching. Compete in intese multiplayer action for up to 4 players. TV-style presentation with Olympic champion commentators Dwight Stones and Marty Liquori. 32 countries represented in 12 events of power, stamina, accuracy and skill.

software.name: Symphony
software.Description: Symphony is an Adventure game, published by Takuyo, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: System Shock 2
software.Description:
You awake from the cold chill of your cryo-tube to discover cybernetic implants grafted to your flesh and the crew of the starship Von Braun slaughtered. The infected roam the halls, their screams and moans beckoning you to join them as the rogue artificial intelligence known as SHODAN taunts and ridicules your feeble attempt to unravel the horrifying mystery of the derelict starship Von Braun. Your Training Has Prepared You For This.
* Choose from 3 specialized branches of the military to utilize unique skills, weaponry, and paranormal psionic powers. * Upgrade and enhance your skills to improve hacking, weapon proficiency, and psionic abilities. * Discover cryptic audio logs, encounter ghostly apparitions and conduct research to give you the advantage in combat and unlock exotic weapons and items. * Play with up to three friends in multiplayer co-op (co-op works in Windows only)

software.name: Taisen Net Gimmick: Capcom & Psikyo All Stars
software.Description: Taisen Net Gimmick: Capcom & Psikyo All Stars is a Puzzle game, developed by Psikyo and published by Capcom, which was released in Japan in 2001.

software.Description: Tantei Shinshi Dash! is an Adventure game, published by Abel Software, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Taxi 2
software.Description: Taxi 2 is a Racing game, developed by Blue Sphere Games and published by Ubisoft, which was released in Europe in 2000.

software.name: Tech Romancer
software.Description: Straight out of classic Japanese anime movies comes Tech Romancer, the crushing 3-D fighter. Monstrous mechanoids battle in sprawling 3-D environments, dwarfing cities and obliterating buildings. Discover hidden power-ups to upgrade weapons, repair damage and enhance robot agility. Unlock and view the complete original Tech Romancer anime movie and play Sega Dreamcast VMU mini-games anytime, anywhere. Tech Romancer will leave you in a twisted heap of metal madness.
software.AKA: Choukousenki Kikaioh (JP), Choukousenki Kikaioh for Matching Service (JP)

software.name: Tee Off
software.Description:
"AN EXCELLENT TITLE TO ADD TO THE SEGA DREAMCAST" - Game Informer
Adjustable difficulty levels & easy to use controls for the hackers and pros.
Take control of your swing: topspin, backspin, even hooks and slices!
Six great arcade game modes - like Match Play and the all-new futuristic Gate Ball Mode!
Hit the links on the world's best courses - America, Scotland, Australia, Japan & Africa!

software.name: Tennis 2K2
software.Description: The top seed is back. Take to the courts of Virtua Tennis 2 as you compete to become the world No1. Serve, smash and lob your way through 16 internationally top-ranked male and female players as you go head to head in singles matches or compete with up to 4 players in doubles and mixed doubles matches. With revamped Tournament, Exhibition and World Tour modes its game set and match Virtua Tennis 2.

software.name: Tenohirao, Taiyouni
software.Description: Tenohirao, Taiyouni is an Adventure game, developed and published by Princess Soft, which was released in Japan in 2004.

software.name: Tentama: 1st Sunnyside
software.Description: Tentama: 1st Sunnyside is an Adventure game, developed and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 2001.

software.name: Test Drive 6
software.Description:
The Ultimate Thrill Ride
Over 40 unique real licensed vehicles - race both Supercars and classic Muscle cars. Now features cars from: Dodge, Ford, Jaguar, Toyota, Audi and many more!
- High-impact collisions, huge jumps, and unpredictable cross-traffic - New economic racing system: purchase, upgrade and collect unique cars in your custom garage - New upgrade and auto paint systems allows for 1000s of unique car combinations - New interactive environments featuring: environmental audio, breakable objects and collidable obstacles - New "All-Units" AI has police working together to take you down - Split-screen head-to-head racing

software.name: Test Drive Cycles
software.Description: Test Drive Cycles is a Racing game, developed by Pitbull Syndicate and published by Infogrames, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Test Drive Le Mans
software.Description: In order to join them, you will need excellent racing strategy and masterful driving skills to finish the race. You will have to be able to control the most powerful cars at speeds of over 350 kmh. You will have to bring out the hero in you! Are you ready for the challenge?

software.name: Test Drive Off-Road 3
software.Description: Test Drive Off-Road 3 is a Racing game, developed and published by Atari, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Test Drive V-Rally
software.Description: The Ultimate Open Road Racing Championship. 16 officially licensed rally cars with 10 bonus cars. Over 80 new tracks in over 12 different countries exclusively for the Sega Dreamcast. Powerful track editor and generator - create, save and exchange saved tracks you create! Real-Time Damage feature shows visible damage during game play.

software.name: Tetris 4D
software.Description: Tetris 4D is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Bullet Proof Software, which was released in Japan in 1998.

software.name: Time Stalkers
software.Description: Welcome to a mysterious world, a world made up of strange lands, hazardous labyrinths and many mysteries. Who created this world? And why? A wandering adventurer by the name of Sword has been summoned to find the answers. From RPG legends 'Climax' comes Time Stalkers, a refreshingly unconventional RPG. Featuring randomly generated dungeons, sub quests and a host of VM mini games.

software.name: Title Defense
software.Description: Title Defense is a Sports game, which was cancelled before it was released.
software.Genre: Sports > Individual > Combat > Boxing / Martial Arts

software.name: TNN Motorsports HardCore Heat
software.Description: Ladies and Gentlemen, get ready for the biggest and wildest race of your life... Get behind the wheel of a 4x4 off road vehicle and prepare to battle your way through various challenging courses from all over the world. Save your 'Artificial Intelligence' skill level and challenge your opponents' best times, or simply go head to head on the toughest maddest, off road racer to hit any console ever.

software.name: Tokusatsu Bouken Katsugeki Super Hero Retsuden
software.Description: Tokusatsu Bouken Katsugeki Super Hero Retsuden is an Adventure game, developed by ALU and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Tokyo Highway Challenge
software.Description: Throw down against road rivals in Point Battle Mode, customize your import dream ride in Quest Mode, or choose Versus Mode to go head-to-head at a blistering 60 frames-per-second in Tokyo Highway Challenge.

software.name: Tokyo Highway Challenge 2
software.Description: Screaming around a blind turn, you cut your opponent off, driving him head-on into the divider. Toast. This is the world of Tokyo Xtreme Racer 2, a blistering battle to rule the streets of Tokyo. With an endless supply of bloodthirsty rivals, it's a high-adrenaline fight to become Emperor of the Streets. Customize your car with hundreds of parts and features. Cruise over 100 miles of highly-detailed of Tokyo highway. Personalize your team logo and share or trade it. Hundreds of new opponents and teams push your skills to the max.

software.name: Tokyo Xtreme Racer
software.Description: Throw down against road rivals in Point Battle Mode, customize your import dream ride in Quest Mode, or choose Versus Mode to go head-to-head at a blistering 60 frames-per-second in Tokyo Highway Challenge.

software.name: Tokyo Xtreme Racer 2
software.Description: Screaming around a blind turn, you cut your opponent off, driving him head-on into the divider. Toast. This is the world of Tokyo Xtreme Racer 2, a blistering battle to rule the streets of Tokyo. With an endless supply of bloodthirsty rivals, it's a high-adrenaline fight to become Emperor of the Streets. Customize your car with hundreds of parts and features. Cruise over 100 miles of highly-detailed of Tokyo highway. Personalize your team logo and share or trade it. Hundreds of new opponents and teams push your skills to the max.

software.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six
software.Description: The most revolutionary action/strategy game of its kind, nothing comes closer to offering an exciting combination of strategy, team-building, realistic three-dimensional graphics and true-to-life special forces action. The ultimate goal is to save yourself and the world from deadly terrorists. You must successfully complete 16 unique missions, plus eagle watch missions. If you fail, the game isn't over. The world is.

software.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear
software.Description: Lead the Rainbow team of elite multi-national special operatives against two deadly terrorist organizations. Life or death missions will take you to real world settings across the globe, including a Jumbo Jet airplane and a famous art museum.

Release.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear

ReleaseImages.Image: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Rogue Spear (US)-1149_front.jpg
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Rogue Spear (US)-1149_back.jpg
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Rogue Spear (US)-1149_side.jpg

Release.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear

ReleaseImages.Image: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Rogue Spear (EU)-1150_front.jpg

software.name: Tomb Raider 4: The Last Revelation
software.Description:
According to Egyptian legend, Horus, son of the light, outwitted the evil God Set and imprisoned him in a secret tomb. Five thousand years later, Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb and unwittingly unleashes the evil God Set, fulfilling the ancient prophecy of his return to plunge mankind into darkness! In a race against time, Lara must use all her wit and skill to reimprison Set and save the world from Armageddon. Pursued at every turn by her arch-rival, the unscrupulous archaeologist Werner Von Croy, Lara embarks on a journey of discovery across Egypt, where she must overcome the most ingenious puzzles and infernal traps ever devised, and face terrifying evil from beyond the grave...
With more twists and turns than an Egyptian labyrinth, this is heart stopping action-adventure; a Tomb Raider that truly offers...
The Last Revelation.

software.name: Tomb Raider Chronicles
software.Description:
Tomb Raider: Chronicles reveals four newly discovered, and previously untold adventures, taking you on a journey from the ruins of Rome, to the bowels of a German U boat, to the rooftops of a hi-tech city in a search of four ancient artifacts.
In light of Lara's recent disappearance, those closest to her gather together at the Croft Estate on a gray, rainy day for a memorial service in her honor. Afterwards, the friends sit quietly together in the study of the Croft Mansion and provide new insights about Lara's past exploits; exploits that have until now remained a secret...

software.name: Tomb Raider: Chronicles
software.Description:
Tomb Raider: Chronicles reveals four newly discovered, and previously untold adventures, taking you on a journey from the ruins of Rome, to the bowels of a German U boat, to the rooftops of a hi-tech city in a search of four ancient artifacts.
In light of Lara's recent disappearance, those closest to her gather together at the Croft Estate on a gray, rainy day for a memorial service in her honor. Afterwards, the friends sit quietly together in the study of the Croft Mansion and provide new insights about Lara's past exploits; exploits that have until now remained a secret...

software.name: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
software.Description:
According to Egyptian legend, Horus, son of the light, outwitted the evil God Set and imprisoned him in a secret tomb. Five thousand years later, Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb and unwittingly unleashes the evil God Set, fulfilling the ancient prophecy of his return to plunge mankind into darkness! In a race against time, Lara must use all her wit and skill to reimprison Set and save the world from Armageddon. Pursued at every turn by her arch-rival, the unscrupulous archaeologist Werner Von Croy, Lara embarks on a journey of discovery across Egypt, where she must overcome the most ingenious puzzles and infernal traps ever devised, and face terrifying evil from beyond the grave...
With more twists and turns than an Egyptian labyrinth, this is heart stopping action-adventure; a Tomb Raider that truly offers...
The Last Revelation.

software.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater
software.Description: Skate as legendary Tony Hawk, or as one of nine top pros. Work your way up the ranks by landing suicidal tricks in brutal competitions to become the highest-ranked skate champ.

Release.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater (Sega All Stars)

software.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2
software.Description: Hawk's back - with new technology, new pros and new tricks! THPS2, the legend rides on! Skate as legendary Tony Hawk or any one of 12 other pro skaters. Create your own custom skaters. Multiple play modes including 1-Player, Career and Free Skate modes, as well as 2-player modes such as Trick Attack, Graffiti Tag and Horse. Build your own custom skate parks with the real-time 3D park editor.

software.name: Tony Hawk's Skateboarding
software.Description: Skate as legendary Tony Hawk, or as one of nine top pros. Work your way up the ranks by landing suicidal tricks in brutal competitions to become the highest-ranked skate champ.

software.name: Totsugeki! Teketeke!! Toy Ranger
software.Description: Be nice to your toys! It's all-out war as neglected old-time toys rebel against the shiny new generation for the title of Toy Commander. Not your average fun and games! -Full immersion in an awesome 3D interactive environment -Choose from 35 different vehicles -50 missions with multiple objectives -Deathmatch mode with 3 distinct ways to play -Up to four-players screen action

software.name: Toy Commander
software.Description: Be nice to your toys! It's all-out war as neglected old-time toys rebel against the shiny new generation for the title of Toy Commander. Not your average fun and games! -Full immersion in an awesome 3D interactive environment -Choose from 35 different vehicles -50 missions with multiple objectives -Deathmatch mode with 3 distinct ways to play -Up to four-players screen action

software.name: Toy Racer
software.Description: On your marks and get set for Toy Racer, as you and up to three players take control in the miniaturized world that is Toy Racer, be the first to cross the finish line but who says you need to play fair! Race against friends or challenge thousands of players across Europe On-line! Featuring four frazy tracks, over twenty-four vehicles, lots of weapons and bonuses on each track. Who says size matters? The online functions for this game are only available in the UK, mainland France, Germany, Spain, Italy and Ireland.

software.name: Treasure Strike
software.Description: Treasure Strike is an Adventure game, developed by h.a.n.d. Inc. and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: TrickStyle
software.Description: Style. Speed. Psycho-stunts. Spectacularly sick graphics. Trickstyle takes you on the ride of your life. Race anywhere through futuristic Manhattan, London and Tokyo, or have a session in the velodrome. Incredible graphics deliver fluid and realistic animations. Over 400 stunts to master, all nine characters have signature moves.

software.name: Tricolore Crise
software.Description: Tricolore Crise is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Victor Interactive Software, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Triggerheart Exelica
software.Description: In the classic vertically-scrolling Japanese arcade shooter Triggerheart Exelica, each weapon has a different combat style, but both can perform unique anchor shots. Anchor an enemy ship, capture it to use as a shield, or throw it back into the fray to cause massive damage. With five levels, three difficulty settings, and all the usual Xbox LIVE leaderboards and achievements, Triggerheart Exelica is a fast-paced, full-featured arcade shooter masterpiece!

software.name: Trizeal
software.Description: Trizeal is an Action game, developed and published by Triangle Service, which was released in Japan in 2005.

software.name: Tropico
software.Description: Tropico is a Strategy game, developed by Gathering and published by PopTop Software, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.Description: Tsuki wa Higashi ni Ha wa Nishi na: Operation Sanctuary is a Simulation game, published by Alchemist, which was released in Japan in 2004.

software.name: Twinkle Star Sprites
software.Description: Twinkle Star Sprites is an Action game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Typing of the Date
software.Description: Typing of the Date is an Action game, developed by Hudson Soft and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 2001.

software.name: Typing of the Dead, The
software.Description: Your rapid-fire typing skills spell doom for the undead in this utterly odd, totally challenging take-off on House of the Dead 2. When you're battling zombies in a nightmare-come-true, ten trigger fingers are definitely better than two!

Release.name: The Typing of the Dead (w/ Keyboard)

ReleaseImages.Image: The Typing of the Dead (w Keyboard) (JP)-9398_front.jpg

software.name: UEFA 2001
software.Description: UEFA 2001 is a Sports game, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: UEFA Dream Soccer
software.Description:
Sega Sports and Infogrames bring you UEFA Dream Soccer. Developed by Silicon Dreams, UEFA Dream Soccer sets new standards in football on Dreamcast. Supporting both traditional and new arcade game modes never seen before in a football such as Global Domination, Time Attack and Team Battle, but that's not all, check out these features.......
- Photo-realistic Male and Female player models - Facial expressions and animation that brings the players to life - Immersive and highly detailed stadiums - Internet connectivity to Sega's Dreamarena - Commentary by Helen Chamberlain, Alan Green and Barry Venison - Unique arcade styled game modes for challenging gameplay - Over 200,000 new ultra high-resolution motion captured frames
UEFA Dream Soccer, it can make your footballing dreams a reality

software.name: UEFA Striker
software.Description: Soccer as you've never seen it before! Lethally effective control system for fluid gameplay and spectacular goals. Stunning stadium and player detail - taking the game to a new level of realism. Advanced 3D engine and Artificial Intelligence combine to give an incredibly authentic playing environment. Pass a series of tests to improve your skills, earning the right to compete against the very best teams and players.

software.name: Ultimate Fighting Championship
software.Description: The Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) is the premier mixed martial arts event in the world. There are no flying chairs or unrealistic moves. Spectators expect and demand to see true-to-life combat. Now, the ultimate fighting event comes to the Dreamcast as the most realistic fighting game ever created.

software.name: Ultimate Fighting Championship: Tapout
software.Description: UFC: Tapout perfectly portrays the real-life mixed-martial arts pay-per-view spectacular; complete with stylized fighter entrances and signature submission moves. A full roster of the world's most accomplished athletes, including current UFC middleweight world champion Tito Ortiz, as well as classic brawlers like Dan Severn, await and promise to offer gamers more full contact fighting than any other title ever created.

software.name: Under Defeat
software.Description: For over ten years, a war has raged on between the Empire and the Union with many lives lost. You will take control of one of the Imperial Forces most technologically advanced helicopters, the VKL5.03 (P) and use its destructive artilleries to bring down the enemy forces, and finally bring the war to an end.

software.name: Undercover AD2025 Kei
software.Description: Undercover AD2025 Kei is an Adventure game, developed by Pulse Interactive and published by Pulse Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Unreal Tournament
software.Description: From the creators of Unreal comes Unreal Tournament, a competition that tests your reflexes and competitive spirit in deadly arenas. Battle 15 of your friends or customizable bots in over 30 different levels, such as pirate ships, waterfronts, speeding trains, and floating castles. Multiplayer modes include Capture the Flag, Assault, Domination, and new Deathmatch variations. With enhanced weapons--including the Impact hammer, which squashes your opponent to mush, and the Redeemer, a rocket-powered nuke--expect the body count to be high.

software.name: Urban Chaos
software.Description:
The new millennium approaches. Turmoil, crime, and famine rule. Gangs, terrorists and violent cults lurk around every corner. As one of two cops, you must try and bring order to the city. D'arci is a young and cunning super-sleuth with unsurpassed reconnaissance and infiltration skills. As Special Forces veteran, Roper is known for his expertise in weapons and explosives. His skills are never questioned, but his mental stability is.
Either one could be the hero this city is waiting for.
But time is running out...

software.name: US Shenmue
software.Description:
The Experience Begins
-A massive and highly detailed 3D world unlike anything ever seen -Real-time fighting with moves learned throughout the game - motion capture with real budo experts -Interact with a huge cast of characters with movements as intricate as a twitch of a finger -"Magic Weather" and "Time Control" technologies bring this world to life in real-time by dramatically effecting changes to environments

software.name: Utau * Tumbling Dice
software.Description: Utau * Tumbling Dice is an Adventure game, developed by Ecole and published by Reindeer, which was released in Japan in 2004.

software.name: V-Rally 2: Expert Edition
software.Description: The Ultimate Open Road Racing Championship. 16 officially licensed rally cars with 10 bonus cars. Over 80 new tracks in over 12 different countries exclusively for the Sega Dreamcast. Powerful track editor and generator - create, save and exchange saved tracks you create! Real-Time Damage feature shows visible damage during game play.

software.name: V.I.P.
software.Description: V.I.P. is an Action game, developed by Kalisto and published by Ubisoft, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Vampire Chronicle
software.Description: Vampire Chronicle is an Action game, developed and published by Capcom, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Vampire Chronicle for Matching Service
software.Description: Vampire Chronicle is an Action game, developed and published by Capcom, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Vanishing Point
software.Description: It's a driving simulation so advanced and authentic it'll drive you mad. Comprehensive vehicle dynamics based on collaboration with industry engineers. Authentically licensed cars from manufacturers like Lotus, Aston-Martin, BMW, Alfa Romeo and more... One of the most advanced 3D driving engines ever developed. Is your mind ready for this much reality?

software.name: Vermilion Desert
software.Description: Vermilion Desert is a Strategy game, published by River Hill Software, which was released in Japan in 1999.

software.name: Vigilante 8: 2nd Battle
software.Description: The Future of Blowing $#!% Up is Here! 18 All-New '70's and Futuristic Vehicles. 8 New Destructible Arenas with Hidden Power-Ups. Earn Points to Upgrade Your Vehicle. Blast Through Insane 1-4 Player Action.

software.name: Vigilante 8: 2nd Offense
software.Description: The Future of Blowing $#!% Up is Here! 18 All-New '70's and Futuristic Vehicles. 8 New Destructible Arenas with Hidden Power-Ups. Earn Points to Upgrade Your Vehicle. Blast Through Insane 1-4 Player Action.

software.name: Virtua Athlete 2000
software.Description: The top 7 events from Track and Field come to life like never before as players vie for the top sports honor - "The World's Greatest Athlete!" Using the latest 3D graphics, Virtua Athlete 2000 challenges you to use quick reflexes, sharp eye-hand coordination, and split-second timing to master each of the events.

software.name: Virtua Athlete 2K
software.Description: The top 7 events from Track and Field come to life like never before as players vie for the top sports honor - "The World's Greatest Athlete!" Using the latest 3D graphics, Virtua Athlete 2000 challenges you to use quick reflexes, sharp eye-hand coordination, and split-second timing to master each of the events.

software.name: Virtua Cop 2
software.Description: Crime is rife and it's time for Virtua City's finest to take to the streets again. Now with the help of Janet Marshall, officers Rage and Smarty must smash the EVL Corporation's hold on the city. You'll need a steady hand to wipe out the swarms of hoodlums and protect the innocent as you select your route through three massive crime-ridden zones packed with weapons, secrets and a thrilling case chase sequence!

software.name: Virtua Fighter 3tb
software.Description:
The legend continues. The fighting game that revolutionized the genre returns in its most powerful incarnation yet. Who will emerge victorious in the Third World Fighting Tournament?
- All new "Team Battle Mode" - 13 fighting stages in full 3D. Elevation and positioning dramatically change fighting strategy - 10 classic characters plus two all-new characters - Stunning attention to detail - clothes ripple, eyes track opponents - Multiple camera angles including 1st person viewpoint - Highly sophisticated fighting engine for incredible depth - Advanced Training Mode - instruct computer opponent to do exactly what you want

software.name: Virtua Striker 2
software.Description: Perform high-flying bicycle kicks, headers and shoot-outs while hearing the chants of the crowd in this flawless arcade translation. Amazing motion-capture animation: the speed and techniques of real players accurately simulated. Full stadium sound effects recreate the frenzy of pro soccer! Highly sophisticated 3D graphics. Improved formation selection system. Unique team-specific attributes

software.name: Virtua Striker 2 Ver. 2000.1
software.Description: Perform high-flying bicycle kicks, headers and shoot-outs while hearing the chants of the crowd in this flawless arcade translation. Amazing motion-capture animation: the speed and techniques of real players accurately simulated. Full stadium sound effects recreate the frenzy of pro soccer! Highly sophisticated 3D graphics. Improved formation selection system. Unique team-specific attributes

software.name: Virtua Tennis
software.Description: Imagine how a tennis player feels when he enters the arena, the crowd is cheering, the atmosphere electric, the adrenaline rushes... Well now you can with Virtua Tennis, the most lifelike and playable tennis game ever! Play as one of eight licensed players and uncover the secret stars. As well as the traditional arcade mode you can play in the exhibition mode, with 4 player action via doubles play. Once you're mastered these modes take on the world in the world circuit mode, with unique training games, different challenges and shops to buy clothing, equipment, stages and playing partners. Virtua Tennis - so realisitc you can almost taste the strawberries and cream.

software.name: Virtua Tennis 2
software.Description: The top seed is back. Take to the courts of Virtua Tennis 2 as you compete to become the world No1. Serve, smash and lob your way through 16 internationally top-ranked male and female players as you go head to head in singles matches or compete with up to 4 players in doubles and mixed doubles matches. With revamped Tournament, Exhibition and World Tour modes its game set and match Virtua Tennis 2.

software.name: Viva Soccer
software.Description: Viva Soccer is a Sports game, developed by Crimson and published by Interplay, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Wacky Races
software.Description: The wackiest, wildest cartoon racing game ever is here. Based on the original Hanna-Barbera cartoon, Wacky Races lets you join your favorite characters on a wild race where only your wits, your driving skills and your bag of dirty tricks will get you across the finish line first! -11 wacky characters to play including Penelope Pitstop, Dick Dastardly & Muttley, and the Slag Brothers -Each vehicle has its own special gadgets and unique abilities -Race across 22 tracks filled with jumps, shortcuts, tunnels, and traps -Foil your adversaries with foul tactics and diabolical schemes -Select from multiple racing modes - Track Challenge, Wacky Cup, Dastardly Time Trials, Vs., Golden Muttley Challenge, and more!

software.name: Walt Disney World Quest: Magical Racing Tour
software.Description:
Catch The Magic!
Experience the thrill of WALT DISNEY WORLD Quest - Magical Racing Tour and find all the missing pieces of the Fireworks Machine. Speed around 13 raceways based on popular WALT DISNEY WORLD Theme Parks and Water Parks, including: Space Mountain, Test Track at Epcot and Rock 'n' Roller Coaster.
software.Franchise: Walt Disney World Quest: Magical Racing Tour

Release.name: Walt Disney World Quest: Magical Racing Tour

software.Description: Weakness Hero Torauman is an Action game, published by Fortyfive, which was released in Japan in 2002.

software.Description: Web Mystery: Yochi Yume o Kenru Neko is an Action game, published by Mebius, which was released in Japan in 1999.

ReleaseImages.Image: Web Mystery Yochi Yume o Kenru Neko (JP)-38542_front.jpg
Web Mystery Yochi Yume o Kenru Neko (JP)-38542_back.jpg

software.name: Wetrix+
software.Description: A rainstorm so fierce, it will keep you from leaving your home for the next six months. Wetrix just might be the most addictive puzzle game of all time. Using randomly shaped 3D blocks as they fall from the sky, you must create a series of lakes and dams before the heavy rains appear. Because if the water drains, you lose! Sound simple? Well, mix in a few natural disasters and bomb attacks, and suddenly you need to muster all your strategy and skill to combat nature's fury!

software.name: What's Shenmue
software.Description: What's Shenmue is an Action Adventure game, developed by Sega AM2 and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1999.

software.name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
software.Description: The game that has captured the nation's imagination can now be played in your own home. With Chris Tarrant as your host, the excitement and tension of the TV show Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? is now available on Dreamcast allowing you to become a virtual millionaire.
software.Franchise: Who Wants to be a Millionaire?

Release.name: Who Wants to be a Millionaire?

ReleaseImages.Image: Who Wants to be a Millionaire (EU)-1224_front.jpg
Who Wants to be a Millionaire (EU)-1224_back.jpg
Who Wants to be a Millionaire (EU)-1224_side.jpg

software.name: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire?
software.Description: Make sure that thinking cap is on real tight, 'cause a wrong answer will cost you a lot more than your shot at a million bucks. Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire will test your wits and tickle your funny bone as you duke it out head-to-head in a trivia showdown that doesn't take any prisoners!

Release.name: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire?

ReleaseImages.Image: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire (US)-40322_front.jpg
Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire (US)-40322_back.jpg

software.name: Wild Metal
software.Description: Kill or be killed. Hunt or be hunted. Reclaim the future for mankind. Engage the enemy solo or play against an opponent in split-screen head-to-head battle. Five armored attack vehicles to choose from each with unique performance characteristics. 17 mechanical menaces to combat. The most insane and innovative weapons assortment ever assembled on the Sega Dreamcast. Locate and capture the different power cores across 3 unique planetary surfaces: Tundra, Aztec Desert and the Red Planet!

software.name: Wind -a breath of heart-
software.Description: Wind -a breath of heart- is an Adventure game, developed by HuneX and published by Atypical Alchemists Associate, which was released in Japan in 2003.

software.name: Wind and Water: Puzzle Battles
software.Description:
With Wind and Water: Puzzle Battles, Yuan Works and redspotgames annouced their latest videogame for the Sega Dreamcast. Originally developed for the GamePark GP2X, this port to the Dreamcast offers a lot of new features and graphics. Developed and ported by Yuan Works.
Exclusive features only available in the Dreamcast version:
-Introducing new character: Mr. VMU -Fully translated into both English and Japanese -New recorded and mastered CD soundtrack -New arcade "Danger Break" system -New graphics, arts and slides -New cutscenes (and more embarassing moments) -New extensive manual and packaging for the Dreamcast version
Extensive package like no other Dreamcast game!
-Professional pressed CD-ROM with 4 color print -40 page full color manual, extra thick (130 g/m) -English and Japanese manual text with many artworks -Shrinkpacked Spinecard (Obi) -Jewel Case with white tray
This game is region-free: Runs on every PAL, NTSC-US and NTSC-J Dreamcast.
This is a CD-ROM based product and might not be compatible with some NTSC-J Dreamcast consoles built after October 2000. Please check the manufacture date on the back of your console before. This software is not officially licensed, designed, manufactured, distributed or endorsed by Sega.
For more information, screenshots and videos, feel free to visit the official website www.wind-water.net or www.redspotgames.com/windandwater.

software.name: Winning Post 4 Program 2000
software.Description: Winning Post 4 Program 2000 is a Sports game, developed and published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: Woody Woodpecker Racing
software.Description: Prepare for the wildest ride of your life as Woody Woodpecker and 8 of his friends bring their brand of comic mischief to the raceways. Join the sly bird himself, Winnie Woodpecker, Chilly Willy and more as they throw dynamite, dodge rotten tomatoes, and drop tire tacks in a high-speed battle for the checkered flag.

software.name: World Neverland 2 Plus
software.Description: World Neverland 2 Plus is a Strategy game, developed by Riverhillsoft and published by River Hill Software, which was released in Japan in 2000.

software.name: World Neverland Plus: Orurudo Oukoku Monogatari
software.Description: World Neverland Plus: Orurudo Oukoku Monogatari is a Strategy game, developed by Riverhillsoft and published by River Hill Software, which was released in Japan in 1999.

Release.name: World Neverland Plus: Orurudo Oukoku Monogatari

ReleaseImages.Image: World Neverland Plus Orurudo Oukoku Monogatari (JP)-38545_front.jpg
World Neverland Plus Orurudo Oukoku Monogatari (JP)-38545_back.jpg

software.name: World Series Baseball 2K1
software.Description:
-Signature batting and pitching styles for today's hottest players. -Hot and cold zones illustrate batters' streaks and slumps. -Weather is based on seasonal atmospheric patterns.
IF THEY CAN DO IT ON THE DIAMOND, YOU CAN DO IT IN THIS GAME!
-Abilities of players based on real sports data. -Awesome new camera angles -Updated MLB rosters for the 2000 season. -Four great modes of play!

software.name: World Series Baseball 2K2
software.Description:
TURN UP THE HEAT
Stare down the competition in six different styles of long ball action, including Network mode with Online match-up. You've never played a baseball game with more realism, control, or depth. From the first pitch of Spring Training to the final out of the World Series, Sega Sports brings the heat.
- MODES - Exhibition, Season, Playoffs, Home Run Derby, Franchise, and Online game modes. - REALISM - Accurate batting stances and pitching wind-ups, player ability based on extensive ratings, player-specific accessories. - CONTROL - Total fielding and lineup control. Create, sign, and trade free agents; manage your pitching rotation and bullpen; set lineups and batting order; and total control of every player on the diamond. - DEPTH - Hot and cold zones for batters, player injuries, multiple fantasy drafts for season and franchise modes, fully licensed with every team and stadium.

software.name: Worms Armageddon
software.Description: What happens when you lead a team of heavily armed Worms into action? Worms Armageddon! Use your creativity and skill in this hilarious action-packed strategy game. Position your Worm, select one of 60 wacky weapons, aim and fire! Watch out, because now you're a target! The laughs never stop as you are thrown into an addictive, fast-paced battle of Worm versus Worm!

software.name: Worms Pinball
software.Description: Worms Pinball is an Action game, developed by Team 17 and published by Atari, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Worms World Party
software.Description: You are invited to the ultimate gaming experience. And if you can't make it, we'll bring the party to you! Those loveable worms are back again, annihilating each other with zany weapons on wacky landscapes. Worms World Party is the pinnable of evolution for strategy gaming enthusiasts. With "Worms" already having a reputation for being a party animal, there is just no reason not to come.

software.name: WWF Attitude
software.Description: Now featuring over 40 of your favorite WWF Superstars including Stone Cold Steve Austin, The Rock, The Undertaker and D-Generation X! Customize your own wrestler's move sets and costumes. Over 20 game modes including all-new specialty matches. Wrestle your way to the title in all-new Career mode. Real-life WWF entrances and theme songs.

software.name: WWF Royal Rumble
software.Description: Immerse yourself in the chaos of a "Royal Rumble" match with up to 9 Superstars in the ring at one time. Better watch your back, because in this type of match there are no allegiances or friendships.

software.name: Xtreme Sports
software.Description: Blazing Xtreme Sports action! Test your skills in 6 hot extreme sports including bungee jumping and skysurfing. Battle to victory in intense triple even racing! Explore 5 exotic real-world locations including Mt. Kilamanjaro, Maui, and the Himalayas, with 12 multi environment tracks to choose from. Relive the action with instant replay!

software.name: Yoshia no Oka de Nekoronde...
software.Description: Yoshia no Oka de Nekoronde... is an Adventure game, developed and published by Naxat Soft, which was released in Japan in 2001.

software.name: Yu Suzuki Game Works Vol. 1
software.Description: Yu Suzuki Game Works Vol. 1 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Sega AM2 and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 2001.

software.name: Yukawa Moto Senmu no Okatara Ikushi
software.Description: Yukawa Moto Senmu no Okatara Ikushi is an Adventure game, published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1999.

ReleaseImages.Image: Yukawa Moto Senmu no Okatara Ikushi (JP)-309881_front.jpg
Yukawa Moto Senmu no Okatara Ikushi (JP)-309881_back.jpg

software.name: Yuki Gatari

software.name: Yume no Tsubasa: Fate of Heart
software.Description: Your dream is to fly, and youve spent years restoring an old plane, hoping that you will be able to fly in the sky just like your father. However, one day, after a test run you find a mysterious girl collapsed near the runway. Who is she? And why is she here?
